main event: Unidentified flying objects reported in St. Louis, Missouri on 12 July 1954 and observed by trained personnel on 26 July 1954.
interesting points: A milky white rectangular object was observed through radar for 3 minutes,The object on 26 July was circular, silver in color, and estimated to be 30 to 50 feet in diameter,The circular object moved at a high rate of speed, first westerly, then reversing direction,The observation of the circular object lasted approximately 2 to 2.5 minutes between 9:10 and 9:15 PM, Observers believe the objects to be of unusual nature and unknown origin.
sighted object: milky white rectangular object and circular silver object
